question: You  recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him  how you feel.Write a letter to the singer. In your letter• say how you feel about his performance• give details of your musical activities• explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I attended your concert last weekend. It was a gorgeous listening buffet.

The piano track you played was so melody that I feel flying in the sky and merging into the ancient forest. I cannot stop thinking about how nice it was. I like your patient and gentle performance which is the best profile I have seen.

Nowadays, I am studying piano activities. I will study hard and I want to be a great musician like you. I go to tafe once a time every week. As the course has 36 lessons, I will finish the plan in a year. In class, the teacher will show us how to use fingers and how to follow the musical notation. Sometimes I discuss playing skills with my classmate and talk about who are genius musicians in the world.

I know you are always busy in your life, I still wonder if you can give me some advice on my study course and can revise my finger gesture on piano. If you can help me with my musical activities, I can be more confident and would increase my performance on the course.
Looking forward to hearing from you
